title: Text Mining-Based Mathematical Approaches for Analyzing MOOC Research Trends

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Applied mathematics course in smartphone-based limited-technology environments analyzing MOOC trends through text mining

learning_goals: Learners can derive key research themes by applying text mining techniques to MOOC research papers
Learners can visually represent MOOC research trends through frequency analysis and keyword network mapping
Learners can interpret mathematics-based text analysis results to predict research directions in the MOOC field

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
